mapper.select: select uno, uname, sex, mail, pwd, uphon, upath, utype from USER order by uno asc
select uno, uname, sex, mail, pwd, uphon, upath, utype from MEMB where uno=#{value}
select uno, uname, sex, mail, pwd, uphon, upath, utype from MEMB where mail=#{value}
select uno, uname, sex, mail, pwd, uphon, upath from MEMB where mail=#{id} and pwd=password(#{password})
select count(*) from MEMB where mail=#{id} and pwd=password(#{password})
mapper.update: update USER set uname=#{name}, sex=#{sex}, mail=#{id}, pwd=password(#{password}), uphon=#{memberPhone}, upath=#{memberPath}, utype=#{memberType} where uno=#{memberNo}
